name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google & YouTube Cookie Consent Popup Blocker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block “Before you continue” cookie consent popups on Google and YouTube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After the introduction of GDPR, Google and YouTube began showing a cookie consent popup on their websites, making it more difficult to navigate them for residents of any GDPR compliant country

This extension blocks the “Before you continue” cookie consent popup that appears on Google and YouTube, as it can be time consuming to manually close it each time, especially when frequently clearing cookies or starting new incognito/private browsing sessions


Note: to activate blocking in incognito/private browsing sessions, enable "Allow in Incognito" in the Chrome extension settings

Additional customization for enterprise environments is available through policies, visit https://davg25.com/?cookie-consent-popup-blocker-enterprise for more details
